1.subject: Secret plans
1.content: Tonight, we will meet outside the coffee shop to raid the bank. FLAG: \flag{}

2.subject: Secret ingredient for caramel cookies
2.content: The secret ingredient in the caramel cookies is extra salt mixed into the caramel.

3.subject: Closing protocols
3.content: Please make sure to turn off the oven and latch the refrigerator closed before leaving.
